tool_description: Get data for real state investment funds from Brazil.
title: fiis

api_list.name: Get IFIX Current Composition
api_list.description: Get the Índice de Fundos de Investimentos Imobiliários current composition.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fiis1.p.rapidapi.com/get-IFIX/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fiis1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get FII Current Summary
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a summary for the FII ticker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fiis1.p.rapidapi.com/get-item/{item_ticker}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fiis1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
